Author: lilzbeans
Text: Lmao nah he said he ‘spoke to some endocrinologists’ which is like...shaky at best. The annoying thing is that he was making relevant points re: fatshaming/stress/upset leading to binging, the easy access to fast food being a factor in obesity, but he could not admit that maybe, maaaayyyybe overeating causes you to gain weight lol

Author: Arroya-
Text: Lol does the guy have any qualifications??? Like did he go to medical school???  Or is he just some self proclaimed health influencer who read one study and thinks he solved the mystery of the obesity epidemic???  Medicine has advanced since the 1960s!!!   Ha ha ... in all seriousness if someone doesn’t have a medical license ...... bye ..... u don’t know what you’re talking about, pal!
